data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hippa, Heikki, Saigusa, Toyohei (2016): Notes on Oriental and East Palaearctic Manota Williston (Diptera, Mycetophilidae), with the description of seven new species. Zootaxa 4084 (3): 377-390, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4084.3.4|16 occurrences
